ComicInfo.Title: Silent Cathedrals, Part Five: The Lord of Fumes!
ComicInfo.Summary: Part 5 of the 6-part 'Silent Cathedrals.' Dr. Sugarman summons foulness from the depths of the Earth to contend with David Kim and Catholic Girl, and with the rest of the mystic coterie.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 20:53:21. [CVDB39811] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 04:40:09. [Issue ID 55865]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Joe Brozowski,J. J. Birch,J. J. Birch
ComicInfo.Inker: Joe Brozowski,J. J. Birch,J. J. Birch
ComicInfo.Colorist: Andrew Burrell,Noelle Giddings,Noelle C. Giddings,Noelle C. Giddings,Andrew Burrell
ComicInfo.Characters: Catholic Girl,Xombi,Boraxis Megatheros,Julian Parker,Liam,Nun of the Above,Rabbi Sinnowitz
ComicInfo.Teams: The Order of the Spoken Flame
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
